name: hm05
effect: Teaches Defog to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Waterfall to a compatible Pokémon. (HS: Whirlpool DPP: Defog Gen III & II & I: Flash)

flavor_text.black_white: The user charges the target at an awesome speed. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user charges the target at an awesome speed. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.
